plot outline: Rangappa is a sixty-year-old real estate dealer who owns a complex. Having sold a few of his shops, he manages the property well and is quite successful. 24-year-old Karthik is an orphan, who along with his three friends looks after the garage owned by Appaiah Bond, an old hunk who is passionate about car races. Rangappa and Appaiah are in the midst of a legal battle with each other. Meanwhile, Rangappa's daughter falls in love with Karthik.
title: Panchatantra
plot: Rangappa is a sixty-year-old real estate dealer who owns a complex. Having sold a few of his shops, he manages the property well and is quite successful. 24-year-old Karthik is an orphan, who along with his three friends looks after the garage owned by Appaiah Bond, an old hunk who is passionate about car races. Rangappa and Appaiah are in the midst of a legal battle with each other. Meanwhile, Rangappa's daughter falls in love with Karthik.::anonymous

A property under litigation has two parties living there. One is a bunch of sprightly youngsters who work at a garage. The other is a lot of senior citizens who rent their space at Rangappa complex and have their small businesses. A drunken wager leads the two groups to compete in a car rally for ownership of the land. Who wins eventually?::Sunayana Suresh
